class.name: StoreTransaction
class.description: This class contains details about a purchase, such as the product ID, purchase date, and expiration date (for subscriptions).

members.member: The date when the subscription expires, as a Unix timestamp. Returns 0 if not applicable.
Whether this transaction is an upgrade of another transaction.
The transaction identifier of the original purchase.
The unique identifier of the purchased product.
The date when the purchase was made, as a Unix timestamp.
The date when the transaction was revoked, as a Unix timestamp. Returns 0 if not revoked.
The unique identifier of the transaction.
